title: Deception
description: Sydney- I’m no stranger to the walk of shame. Relationships are messy and someone always gets hurt. One night’s all they get from me.Until him.Now there’s an unknown enemy forcing me back into the scene of my fears. Before long I’m questioning everything, including if I have what it takes to make a relationship work...to be his blue. Cross- I’ve hidden from the ghosts of my past, and the last place I ever thought I would be is here, back on this stage.I’m the strength, the quiet calm to our crew. But when it comes to the woman I love, I’ll leave the solitude and head back to the flames...And if she gets caught in the crossfire, I’ll burn them all to the ground.
author: Brittany Crowley
